verses.verse: And <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> down <S%H1157>through<s%> a <S%H7639>lattice<s%> in his <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chamber<s%> that was in <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and was <S%H2470>sick:<s%> and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baalzebub<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> I shall <S%H2421>recover<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2483>disease.<s%>

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H1696>say<s%> to them, Is it not because there is not a <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that you <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baalzebub<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron?<s%>

Now <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> You shall not <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from that <S%H4296>bed<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> you are <S%H5927>gone<s%> up, but shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%> And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3212>departed.<s%>
And when the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to him, he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>Why<s%> are you <S%H2088>now<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, There <S%H5927>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> up to <S%H7125>meet<s%> us, and <S%H559>said<s%> to us, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> that <S%H7971>sent<s%> you, and <S%H1696>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Is it not because there is not a <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that you <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baalzebub<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron?<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> you shall not <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from that <S%H4296>bed<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> you are <S%H5927>gone<s%> up, but shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> was he <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H7125>meet<s%> you, and <S%H1696>told<s%> you <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words?<s%>

And they <S%H559>answered<s%> him, He was an <S%H1167>hairy<s%> <S%H8181><s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H247>girt<s%> with a <S%H232>girdle<s%> of <S%H5785>leather<s%> about his <S%H4975>loins.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to him a <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And he <S%H5927>went<s%> up to him: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of an <S%H2022>hill.<s%> And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him, You <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H3381>Come<s%> <S%H3381>down.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> then let <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> you and your <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And there <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

<S%H7725>Again<s%> also he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> to him, O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> has the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3381>Come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4120>quickly.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>If<s%> I be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> let <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> you and your <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> a <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3766>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and <S%H2603>sought<s%> him, and <S%H1696>said<s%> to him, O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, let my <S%H5315>life,<s%> and the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>burnt<s%> up the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H2572>fifties<s%> with their <S%H2572>fifties:<s%> therefore let my <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H3381>Go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with him: be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of him. And he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with him to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> For as <S%H3282>much<s%> <S%H834><s%> as you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baalzebub<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> is it not because there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of his <S%H1697>word?<s%> therefore you shall not <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> off that <S%H4296>bed<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> you are <S%H5927>gone<s%> up, but shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>

So he <S%H4191>died<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%> And <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
